# HKMetadataKeyMenstrualCycleStart

**Global Variable**

A key that indicates whether the sample represents the start of a menstrual cycle. This metadata key is required for [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryTypeIdentifier/menstrualFlow] category samples.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyMenstrualCycleStart: String
```

## Discussion

Set this key’s value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the sample represents the start of a menstrual cycle; otherwise, set it to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: HKMetadataKeyMenstrualCycleStart
